textRules:
Event Period

2019-09-20 to 2019-09-26 23:59


Event Description
  1. The Legendary Illusory Griffin & Magical Fox Bundle are hidden in 2 out of the 9 magic cards.
  2. Spend 30 Diamond to flip a card and win the prize. If the card does not contain the Grand Prize, it will be closed again.
  3. Card positions will be shuffled after each flip.
  4. Remove a card permanently to increase your chance of winning the Grand Prize. Cost to remove a card increases when there are less cards on the board, but you also get to earn better rewards as you remove more and more cards.
    • Removing 1st card: A
    • Removing 2nd card: B
    • Removing 3rd card: C
    • Removing 4th card: D
    • Removing 5th card: E
    • Removing 6th card: F
    • Removing 7th card: G
  5. Event ends when you have won both Illusory Grifffin and Magical Fox bundle.
